mapper.select: SELECT FORM_CODE, FORM_NAME FROM DOC_FORM ORDER BY FORM_CODE
SELECT PERIOD_CODE, PERIOD FROM DOC_RETENTION_PERIOD ORDER BY PERIOD_CODE

SELECT DF.FORM_CODE, DT.FORM_DETAIL_CODE, DFM.FORM_DETAIL_SEQ, DT.FORM_DETAIL_NAME, DT.FORM_DETAIL_TYPE FROM DOC_FORM_MAPPING DFM INNER JOIN DOC_FORM_DETAIL_TEMPLATE DT ON DT.FORM_DETAIL_CODE = DFM.FORM_DETAIL_CODE INNER JOIN DOC_FORM DF ON DF.FORM_CODE = DFM.FORM_CODE WHERE DF.FORM_CODE = #{formCode} ORDER BY DFM.FORM_DETAIL_SEQ
SELECT APPR_TYPE_CODE, APPR_TYPE_NAME FROM APPROVAL_TYPE ORDER BY APPR_TYPE_CODE
SELECT DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT E.EMP_CODE, E.COM_CODE, E.DEPT_CODE, E.RANK_CODE, E.DEPT_CODE, E.RIGHT_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_ID, E.EMP_PWD, E.EMP_E_MAIL, E.EMP_BIRTHDAY, E.EMP_TEL, E.EMP_PHONE, E.EMP_JOIN_DATE, E.EMP_PROMOTION_DATE, E.EMP_ADDRESS1, E.EMP_ADDRESS2, E.EMP_STATUS, E.EMP_ETC, E.EMP_ACCOUNT_NO, E.EMP_PROFILE_NAME, E.EMP_LAST_LOGIN_DATE, E.EMP_FILE_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, R.RANK_NAME FROM EMP E INNER JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN RANK R ON E.RANK_CODE = R.RANK_CODE WHERE EMP_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT E.EMP_CODE, E.COM_CODE, E.DEPT_CODE, E.RANK_CODE, E.DEPT_CODE, E.RIGHT_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_ID, E.EMP_PWD, E.EMP_E_MAIL, E.EMP_BIRTHDAY, E.EMP_TEL, E.EMP_PHONE, E.EMP_JOIN_DATE, E.EMP_PROMOTION_DATE, E.EMP_ADDRESS1, E.EMP_ADDRESS2, E.EMP_STATUS, E.EMP_ETC, E.EMP_ACCOUNT_NO, E.EMP_PROFILE_NAME, E.EMP_LAST_LOGIN_DATE, E.EMP_FILE_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, R.RANK_NAME FROM EMP E INNER JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN RANK R ON E.RANK_CODE = R.RANK_CODE WHERE E.EMP_STATUS = 'N'
AND D.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL_DOC WHERE DOC_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT D.DOC_CODE, D.PERIOD_CODE, D.DOC_FORM_CODE, D.EMP_CODE, D.DOC_TITLE, TO_CHAR(D.DOC_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(D.DOC_UPDATED, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DOC_UPDATED, D.DOC_STATUS, F.FORM_NAME, E.EMP_NAME FROM APPROVAL_DOC D INNER JOIN DOC_FORM F ON D.DOC_FORM_CODE = F.FORM_CODE INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_CODE = D.EMP_CODE WHERE D.DOC_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY D.DOC_CODE DESC
SELECT FORM_DETAIL_CODE, FORM_DETAIL_NAME, FORM_DETAIL_TYPE FROM DOC_FORM_DETAIL_TEMPLATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOC_FORM (FORM_CODE, FORM_NAME, FORM_INTRO, FORM_USE_YN) VALUES (SEQ_DOC_FORM_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{formName}, #{formIntro}, #{formUseYn})

insert.foreach: INTO DOC_FORM_MAPPING (FORM_CODE, FORM_DETAIL_CODE, FORM_DETAIL_SEQ) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(FORM_CODE) FROM DOC_FORM), #{item.formDetailCode}, #{item.formDetailSeq})
